***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [lʱə]
**** Letter[edit] ****
ल्ह • (lha) (Newa spelling 𑐯)
   1. Used to represent the [lʱ] sound in Newar

***** Sherpa[edit] *****
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): /l̥a/
**** Letter[edit] ****
ल्ह (lha)
   1. Used to represent the [l̥] sound in Sherpa. [1]
